long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
UpBuddy ensures you don't get ripped off while hiring on UpWork.  Here is a list of some of the features:

- set weekly and monthly budgets
- see the exact day and time the freelancer worked
- see how much they charged you on any given day
- the total amount billed historically
- see all of their Github activity on your repo
- see what time it is in their country

This is just a small list of the features with UpBuddy
